text:
Hey <!channel>!

We're rolling in to the *last 2 weeks of the programme!* :scream:

We're going to try a little something new this week...

Based on feedback on what students wanted insights to (plus what you guys said you'd be interested in tracking for your own self-reflection), _Dex & I are going to try sending the below update to our mentees every day this week._

Might be quite interesting for a bunch of us to *send this to our mentees daily* (it could fuel conversation!), then at the end of the week we'll share privately with you how you compare to the E-Mentor group average!

SIMPLY COPY, PASTE & UPDATE THE FOLLOWING EACH OF THE NEXT 5 DAYS!>>
*Today I worked:* from AM to PM
*Today tasks / activities I worked on:*
*Today my colleague / boss gave me feedback of:*
*Today I'm learning / reading:*
*Today I'm feeling (stress levels):*
